clinical_study.brief_title: Database Concerning Patients Consulting the Obesity Clinic
clinical_study.official_title: Database Concerning Patients Consulting the Obesity Clinic of University Hospitals Leuven

brief_summary.textblock: A registry of individuals that visit the Obesity Clinic of the University Hospitals of Leuven will be established. The objective of this registry is to improve the knowledge about obesity, the treatment of obesity and its outcomes.

detailed_description.textblock: A registry/database is constructed with data of the individuals that visit the Obesity Clinic of the University Hospitals of Leuven. Data will be obtained from the screening visits and all follow-up visits in terms of sociodemographics, treatment and treatment outcomes, disease impact, biochemistry, questionnaires, QoL, â€¦

primary_outcome.measure: Routine treatment data (sociodemographics, treatment and treatment outcome, disease impact, biochemistry, questionnaires, ...)
primary_outcome.description: The objective is to develop an Obesity Clinic registry to collect routine treatment data (sociodemographics, treatment and treatment outcome, disease impact, biochemistry, questionnaires, ...) using the electronic medical record to improve the knowledge on obesity, the treatment of obesity and its outcomes.
